$comment: Manual overrides for interface -> concrete class resolution. Used when parameter names or deploy scripts don't provide enough information to infer the concrete implementation.

$documentation.$comment: The following interfaces are handled automatically by the resolver:

selfReferential.ICPURNG: CPU contracts implement ICPURNG themselves. In Solidity, address(0) triggers self-reference. Passes undefined in TS.
selfReferential.IGachaRNG: GachaRegistry depends on IGachaRNG but deploy scripts pass address(0). Passes undefined in TS.

inferred.IEffect parameters: Inferred from parameter names like _FROSTBITE_STATUS -> FrostbiteStatus
